          <title>
            <string language="en">Frequency of musical instruments  trombone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Frequenz des musikalischen Instrumente trombone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fréquence de trombone musical d'instruments</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Freqüência do trombone musical dos 
instrumentos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Frequenza del trombone musicale degli strumenti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συχνότητα του μουσικού trombone οργάνων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Frecuencia del trombone musical de los 
instrumentos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Second of four illustrations on matching a trombone to its corresponding sound frequency. Shown here is a long slide trombone.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">frequency</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">musical instruments</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">slide length</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sound</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">trombone</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">An zweiter Stelle von vier Abbildungen auf dem 
Zusammenbringen eines trombone zu seiner entsprechenden stichhaltigen 
Frequenz. Hier gezeigt ein langes Plättchen trombone.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En second lieu de quatre illustrations sur 
apparier un trombone à sa fréquence saine correspondante. 
Montré ici est un long trombone de glissière.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em segundo de quatro ilustrações em combinar um
trombone a sua freqüência sadia correspondente. É mostrado 
aqui um trombone longo da corrediça.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In secondo luogo di quattro illustrazioni sul 
abbinare un trombone alla relativa frequenza sana corrispondente. 
È indicato qui un trombone lungo dello scorrevole.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δεύτερη τεσσάρων απεικονίσεων στο ταίριασμα ενός 
trombone την αντίστοιχη υγιή συχνότητά του. Εμφανισμένο 
εδώ είναι ένα μακρύ trombone φωτογραφικών διαφανειών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En segundo lugar de cuatro ilustraciones en 
corresponder con un trombone a su frecuencia sana correspondiente. 
Se muestra aquí un trombone largo de la diapositiva.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Frequenz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musikinstrumente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
